thread.title: Cassandra Kohn
thread.title_full: Software Advice reviewed by Cassandra Kohn

author: Cassandra Kohn
title: Cassandra Kohn
text: I never knew there were so many different HRIS software systems out there, or where to start when I was looking for a system for my small company to use. I was given 5 different companies to look at, with their reps contacting me within hours of talking with Software Advice and this service was free! We are in our final stages of moving forward to choose one of the companies recommended, and I'm very excited that this didn't drag out to take months in research. Thank you Software Advice!
